greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: exp(x^4/(1 - x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..444
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[a[n-j] Binomial[n-1, j-1] j!, {j, 4, n}]];
a /@ Range[0, 23] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 21 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: E.g.f.: Product_{i>k} exp(x^i): A000262 (k=0), A052845 (k=1), A293049 (k=2), this sequence (k=3).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 29 2017
